section.heading: Corporate powers.
section.text: The Trust Fund may exercise those powers conferred upon a nonprofit corporation pursuant to Chapters 1 and 4 of Title 29.

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 18-378 substituted “Chapters 1 and 4 of Title 29” for “subchapter I of Chapter 3 of Title 29”.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary addition of subchapter, see notes to § 4-1341.01.
